Yes sure, there is whole bouquet of benefits that we offer with the plan you choose and check the benefits as below:
a) Handset damage repair
b) Unused data will be added back
c) Amazon prime subscription
d) Live TV & Movies will be free
e) Free calls on National Roaming
f) Trackage of usage every minute
g) Saving up to 20% on family mobile spends
